parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate. It discusses regulations related to construction materials and does not mention any political figure or party.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and targets a wide audience interested in construction and regulations.  The content is not a personal communication.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to promote information about construction regulations and the products of Pipelife Romania. There is no intention to influence the vote in the parliamentary elections.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post presents information related to construction regulations, which could be considered a form of informative journalism. It links to a magazine article, further supporting this interpretation.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post does not express personal opinions related to the elections.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>3163699457269101</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post is an advertisement for Pipelife Romania, focusing on construction regulations (UE 305/2011).  The content is purely informational and does not mention any political candidates or parties. The post's objective is to promote the company's products and services, not to influence the outcome of the parliamentary elections.  The targeting of the advertisement is broad, focusing on those interested in construction, not specifically on voters.  The post does not violate Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334/2006 because it does not meet the criteria for electoral propaganda.  It lacks a direct reference to a candidate or party (a), its objective is not electoral (c), and it falls within the bounds of informative journalism (d).
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Millenium Management Sistem SRL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
